name: Foggy Night
description:
Programming: Kori - https://kori88.itch.io/

Art: irl_gremlin - http://irl-gremlin.tumblr.com/

Music: Onzerc - https://soundcloud.com/onzerc

YOU FIND YOURSELF LOST WHILE WANDERING THOUGH THE FOREST WITH YOUR PET SLIME. YOU'VE HEARD TALES THAT EVERY YEAR ON THIS DAY A THICK FOG ROLLS IN AND FEROCIOUS BEASTS ALONG WITH IT...

BRIGHTEN YOUR SLIME TO REPEL THE FOG BY FEEDING IT FIREFLIES. PRESS SHIFT TO THROW HIM.

COLLECT ALL THE FIREFLIES TO WIN
